meta.article_title: April 25, 2022 - How to Stop a Simple Third-Ball Forehand Attack

stop-simple-third-ball-forehand-attack.probleme: Stop a Simple Third-Ball Forehand Attack

debutant.description: To bounce twice, opponent can't loop it; takes touch but huge weapon at advanced levels.

intermediaire.description: Make push deep, heavy, and low; server dominates with forehand.

avance.description: Use short and long pushes, flips; freeze opponent with last-second quick push.

exercices_complementaires.nom: Push to the wide corner or even outside
exercices_complementaires.description: Make opponent move more; server can't loop it.

exercices_complementaires.nom: Quick push to the wide forehand or backhand
exercices_complementaires.description: Catch server off guard; freeze opponent with last-second quick push.

exercices_complementaires.nom: Flip the serve, to wide backhand or forehand and middle
exercices_complementaires.description: Against server that wants to follow with a forehand, flip to wide corners; many players find backhand flips easier.
